member.name: T:Petabridge.Cmd.Cluster.Sharding.ClusterShardingCommands
member.summary: Provides a set of commands for working with on the current node.
member.remarks: NOTE: these commands will only work as expected on nodes that have started ShardRegions and have access to a live, running instance.
